channel.title: Pur3z718 the best server from 2014, 2012 PK + video!
channel.description:
Hey Fellow rsps'ers! and welcome to our new project called "Pur3z718'' This server is an 718 revision + old school PK! (No EOC), and 753 revision items added!
[left][/left] Features:
-753 revision items -AMAZING old school pk -17 bosses -FULL HD -Fixed, Resizeable and Fullscreen Modes 100% working -Webclient -Amazing minigames -PMV/Skilling/Merching to get money! -Melee, Archer or Mager starter gear + 1Mil -Full Slayer Tower -Zombie onslaught (Own created Minigame) -Dominion Tower working (ENDURANCE) -Cool PVP places -The Crucible (minigame) (Looks like bounty Hunter) -Fight caves 100% working all 64 waves!!! -Tokhaar-Fight Kiln -Max/Comp cape emote 100% working -Comp cape customise works!! -Namechange works -And lots moree!!
P.S. If you have awesome Idea's for the server, feel free to tell us! we would love to make it better for our players! :)
Java blocks the webclient? No worries! Skip the youtube video till 8:18. Follow the instructions and boom! Enjoy playing :)
Video of the server: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AgE0iXGy8wc Webclient: http://pur3z718.tk/
Hope to see you all in-game!
Owner: Hoster Co-owners: Mod Kestutis, Mod Naichel
Kind Regards
Pk3pker,

item.title: Pur3z718 the best server from 2014, 2012 PK + video!
item.dc:creator: @pk3pker pk3pker
item.description:
@pk3pker wrote:

Hey Fellow rsps’ers! and welcome to our new project called "Pur3z718’'
This server is an 718 revision + old school PK! (No EOC), and 753 revision items added!

[left][/left] Features:

-753 revision items
-AMAZING old school pk
-17 bosses
-FULL HD
-Fixed, Resizeable and Fullscreen Modes 100% working
-Webclient
-Amazing minigames
-PMV/Skilling/Merching to get money!
-Melee, Archer or Mager starter gear + 1Mil
-Full Slayer Tower
-Zombie onslaught (Own created Minigame)
-Dominion Tower working (ENDURANCE)
-Cool PVP places
-The Crucible (minigame) (Looks like bounty Hunter)
-Fight caves 100% working all 64 waves!!!
-Tokhaar-Fight Kiln
-Max/Comp cape emote 100% working
-Comp cape customise works!!
-Namechange works
-And lots moree!!

P.S. If you have awesome Idea’s for the server, feel free to tell us! we would love to make it better for our players!

Java blocks the webclient? No worries! Skip the youtube video till 8:18. Follow the instructions and boom! Enjoy playing

Video of the server: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AgE0iXGy8wc
Webclient: http://pur3z718.tk/

Hope to see you all in-game!

Owner: Hoster
Co-owners: Mod Kestutis, Mod Naichel

Kind Regards

Pk3pker,
